AuctionEnded(address,uint256).details: emitted when the auction ends and the auction ends method is called

params.amount: the highest bid at the end
params.winner: the highest bidder at the end

HighestBidIncreased(address,uint256).details: emitted when the highest bid gets increased

constructor.details: the initializer modifier is to avoid someone initializing      the implementation contract after deployment

initialize(uint256,address,address,addre.details: initializes the auction (called by auctions manager after deploy)

params.auctionDuration_: the duration of the auction (protocol parameter set by governance)
params.jotPool_: the address of the jot contract
params.jot_: the address of the jot contract
params.nftId_: the id of the nft being auctioned
params.syntheticCollection_: the address of the synthetic collection contract

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

_claimed.details: set to true at the end, disallows any change.

auctionEndTime().notice: the date when the auction will finish

auctionsManager().notice: the address of auctions manager (auctions fabric)

bid(uint256).notice: bid on the auction.         the value will only be refunded if the         auction is not won.

endAuction().notice: winner can claim the token after auction end time

highestBid().notice: the current highest bid of the auction

highestBidder().notice: the current highest bidder of the auction

jot().notice: the address of the jot contract for the synthetic collection

jotPool().notice: the address of the jot pool contract for the synthetic collection

nftId().notice: the id of the synthetic nft token being auctioned

syntheticCollection().notice: the address of the synthetic collection contract for this token

withdraw().notice: withdraw a bid that was overbid
